New Records: Luisangel Acuna launched his third homer in just his eighth big league game.
Key Match Events: Sean Manaea was dominant in seven-plus innings, charged with three runs on three hits without a walk and with six strikeouts.
Francisco Alvarez hit a clutch two-run double in the seventh inning.
Luisangel Acuna hit a solo home run in the second inning.
Brandon Nimmo delivered a go-ahead hit in the seventh inning.
Edwin Diaz struck out the potential tying run in the eighth inning and shut down the Phillies in the ninth.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Carlos Mendoza described the atmosphere as 'unbelievable'.
Brandon Nimmo praised Luisangel Acuna's steadiness and excellence.
Francisco Alvarez expressed confidence in his improved performance.
Carlos Mendoza expressed optimism about playing more games in October.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game had the fifth-biggest crowd in regular-season Citi Field history.
The Mets remained two games clear of the Braves in the chase for the final NL wild card.
